trans-unit.source: %1$d Open **%2$s** %3$d Click %4$@ to open the application menu then click **Password Manager** %5$d Click %6$@ **at the top left** of the Password Manager and select **Settings** %7$d Find “Export Passwords” and click **Download File** %8$d Save the passwords file someplace you can find it (e.g., Desktop) %9$d %10$@
trans-unit.target: %1$d Open **%2$s** %3$d Click %4$@ to open the application menu then click **Password Manager** %5$d Click %6$@ **at the top left** of the Password Manager and select **Settings** %7$d Find “Export Passwords” and click **Download File** %8$d Save the passwords file someplace you can find it (e.g., Desktop) %9$d %10$@
trans-unit.note: Instructions to import Passwords as CSV from Brave browser. %N$d - step number %2$s - browser name (Brave) %4$@, %6$@ - hamburger menu icon %10$@ - “Select Passwords CSV File” button **bold text**; _italic text_
Tooltip for the Autofill panel's Show Password button

trans-unit.source: Sync has been paused. If you want to continue syncing this device, reconnect using another device or your recovery code.
trans-unit.target: Sync has been paused. If you want to continue syncing this device, reconnect using another device or your recovery code.
trans-unit.note: Description for alert shown when sync error occurs because of invalid login credentials

trans-unit.source: Check for updates but let you choose to install them
trans-unit.target: Check for updates but let you choose to install them
trans-unit.note: Title of the checkbox item to set up manual updates of the browser

trans-unit.source: Open Link in New Fire Tab
trans-unit.target: Open Link in New Fire Tab

trans-unit.source: DuckDuckGo isn't your default browser. Get more protection
trans-unit.target: DuckDuckGo isn't your default browser. Get more protection
trans-unit.note: Body of the banner view that invites users to set DuckDuckGo as their default browser

trans-unit.source: When you Fireproof a site, cookies won't be erased and you'll stay signed in, even after using the Fire Button.
trans-unit.target: When you Fireproof a site, cookies won't be erased and you'll stay signed in, even after using the Fire Button.

trans-unit.source: The app required to open that link can’t be found
trans-unit.target: The app required to open that link can’t be found
trans-unit.note: ’Link’ is link on a website, it couldn't be opened due to the required app not being found
Application name to be displayed in the About dialog in App Store app
The title of the notification when Privacy Pro subscription expired

trans-unit.source: To use the VPN, the DuckDuckGo app needs to be in the Applications folder on your Mac. Click the button below to move the app and restart the browser.
trans-unit.target: To use the VPN, the DuckDuckGo app needs to be in the Applications folder on your Mac. Click the button below to move the app and restart the browser.
trans-unit.note: Description for the onboarding move-app-to-applications step
Button for adding email address to subscription
Title for the subscription feedback section

trans-unit.source: Some passwords (n) can't sync because some of their fields exceed the character limit.
trans-unit.target: Some passwords (n) can't sync because some of their fields exceed the character limit.
trans-unit.note: Alert message for multiple invalid logins being filtered out of synced data
